com.revolsys.util

Class JexlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.util.JexlUtil

  • public final class JexlUtil
extends Object
    The JexlUtil is a utility class for processing strings that contain patterns from the Jakarta Commons Jexl library.
    Author:
    Paul Austin

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_EXPRESSION_PATTERN
      The default expression pattern matching expressions in the form ${el}.

    • Method Detail

      • createExpression

        public static org.apache.commons.jexl.Expression createExpression(String expression)
                                                           throws Exception
        Convert expressions into valid JexlExpressions, if the string does not contain any expressions in the form ${el} then null will be returned and the caller can use the raw string.
        Parameters:
        expression - The string containing expressions.
        Returns:
        The expression object for the string expression.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error creating the expression.

      • createExpression

        public static org.apache.commons.jexl.Expression createExpression(String expression,
                                                  String expressionPattern)
                                                           throws Exception

        Convert expressions into valid JexlExpressions, if the string does not contain any expressions that match the expressionPattern then null will be returned and the caller can use the raw string.

        The expressionPattern can be used to define an alternate pattern than the DEFAULT_EXPRESSION_PATTERN that defines expressions in the form ${el}. The pattern is defined as a Java Regular expression. The contents of the expression part of the pattern must be enclosed in () to define the group. The characters outside the first group will be removed from the string and the expression portion will be added to the expression.

        Parameters:
        expression - The string containing expressions.
        expressionPattern - The regular expression pattern used to identify expressions in the string. The first group in the expression will be used as the expression.
        Returns:
        The expression object for the string expression.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error creating the expression.

      • evaluateExpression

        public static Object evaluateExpression(org.apache.commons.jexl.JexlContext context,
                        org.apache.commons.jexl.Expression expression)
